suite.name: TC01 Verify API

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=reqres, url=https://api.restful-api.dev/, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://api.restful-api.dev/objects/7 path_url=/objects/7 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.msg: ${BodyRespone} = {"id":"7","name":"Apple MacBook Pro 16","data":{"year":2019,"price":1849.99,"CPU model":"Intel Core i9","Hard disk size":"1 TB"}}
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

suite.doc: ตรวจสอบ API ของ Reqres.in
